Articles.Content: The storage bag looks great! I can't wait to start including y'all's TAC stuff into my designs. ^^
I use this mod without TAC. What do I do with the water that is produced by fuel cells? Can I dump it somehow?

I use this mod without TAC. What do I do with the water that is produced by fuel cells? Can I dump it somehow?

Use can use the Elektron to split it back into Hydrogen and Oxygen, if you have lots of solar panels, that way the whole thing works like a huge battery. Otherwise just ignore it (there's no way to vent resources into space).
Does the fuel cell still work if water is full?

Hi! This pack is getting more awesome by the minute, wich makes me consider to use it.

Since i never messed around with ressources, a quick noob question: is YOUR hydrogen the same than say, what Near Future Propulsion uses? Is it compatible or do I have to tweak it myself?

Hi! This pack is getting more awesome by the minute, wich makes me consider to use it.

Since i never messed around with ressources, a quick noob question: is YOUR hydrogen the same than say, what Near Future Propulsion uses? Is it compatible or do I have to tweak it myself?

It'll most likely be different, as we use specific compression ratios to fit more of the resource in a smaller package (which is how it worked on Apollo with their cryogenic storage). Shouldn't be too hard to change the .cfgs either way though

But then again, I've never played with those mods so I can't be too sure.

Edited August 5, 2014 by Daishi

Our hydrogen is defined as a gas a STP (Standard temperature and pressure). If NFP uses liquid hydrogen and calls it hydrogen then it won't work. If it calls it liquid hydrogen then it's compatible (although the two resources will be different). Same story for oxygen / LOX

ALthough it would be easy enough to convert our parts to use liquid resources, by changing the quantities.

So, I released a new version just now. ^^

This one appears to be pretty robust from my bug testing attempts, I swear!

If it calls it liquid hydrogen then it's compatible

>.< stupid me, NFP indeed uses LIQUID hydrogen. Told ya I'm not used to custom ressources...

Sorry and thank you guys!

>.< stupid me, NFP indeed uses LIQUID hydrogen. Told ya I'm not used to custom ressources...

Sorry and thank you guys!

Closer to the release of 1.0 I'll be looking at what other mods we can work with. I'll put NFP on the list (along with Real Fuels and Interstellar).

Version 0.75.5 Released

This release finally fixes all the convertor issues with updates to the Fuel Cell and Elektron along with version 1.22 of Generic Resource Convertor.

Download links and change log in the first post.

I love the style of this mod, but when are TAC Life Support Food containers going to be implemented? Oxygen and Water are taken care of by stock, but without Food you can't replace using the TAC containers.

I love the style of this mod, but when are TAC Life Support Food containers going to be implemented? Oxygen and Water are taken care of by stock, but without Food you can't replace using the TAC containers.

End of august, max.

please make a folding ladder for the container system, one that goes to the ground and the the storage system bridges. is helpy when storage system under pod like mk1 is

This mod is awesome. Following it every day. Just one small thing I noticed: On the new water storage block, it says "Hydrogen" on the inside of the Hatch.

This mod is awesome. Following it every day. Just one small thing I noticed: On the new water storage block, it says "Hydrogen" on the inside of the Hatch.

That's because I accidentally released a dev version of the water container

It should still be using the old model until a new version is released for 0.8

Sorry, I've updated the download if it bothers you.
